title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1044.11 - Firearms or other weapons
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1044.11 - Firearms or other weapons

State Regulations

No firearm or other weapon s (as the term is used in the

New York State Penal Law) may be carried in or on any facility or conveyance
except as permitted by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1044.11

New

York State Register May 17, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 20, eff. 5/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
